Hello Silver!!

Welcome to this RPG :) I'm Airly, pleased to meet ya, I recoment to 
check the rules section in our website http://rauq.sytes.net/nbwrpg
And ask Council members for all doubts and questions :)

Council Members are: Robo Rick, Azure and I :)

WELCOME again :) and have fun :)
